name: Freestyle
description: Check the games for eligible hints.
games: Shadow Shinies - Pokemon Colosseum, Fossil Restores - BDSP, SWSH, Let’s Go, XY, ORAS, BW, B2W2, DPPt, HGSS, FRLG, RSE, Roamers - BDSP, DPPt, HGSS, FRLG, RSE, GSC, Pokemon Quest Shiny Legendary - Pokemon Quest

name: Horde Hunting
evidence: Evidence in the horde battle and the summary screen once obtained.

name: Wormhole SRs
evidence: Evidence in the battle and summary screen once obtained.

name: Underground
evidence: Evidence Switch clip or screenshot of you in the battle with the mon and summary screen.

name: Fishing
evidence: Yes, chain fishing is allowed. Evidence summary screen with date evidence.

name: Mythical
games: Mew (Emerald), Celebi (VC Crystal), Deoxys (FRLG), Shaymin (DPPt and BDSP), Darkrai (DPPt and BDSP) and Arceus (BDSP)
evidence: Evidence proof of capture and date.

name: Radar Shiny
evidence: Evidence chain number preferably shiny patch as well and summary screen with date obtained.

name: SOS
evidence: Evidence SOS battle with shiny and summary screen with date obtained.

name: Legends: Arceus Map Shiny
evidence: All 5 shinies must be obtained by a single team member and can be obtained by any method including MMOs and MOs. + Evidence of when the shiny is encountered or when leaving the area with the professors report to show pokemon obtained (Minimum 5 screenshots)

name: Dex Nav
evidence: Dex level cannot be maxed out and must be shown as proof before starting the hunt. + Shiny must be the targeted pokemon. + Dex level must be shown at the end of the hunt and can be max by the end of the hunt (if it takes that long)

name: Let's Go Only
games: Let's Go Pikachu/Eevee [Can be obtained in any way (eg. Trades, fossil restores, RE’s, Chaining, etc)]
evidence: Proof of wild encounter or summary screen and proof of date required

name: Soft Reset Starter
games: All main series games and XD Gale of Darkness
evidence: Must provide screenshot of the target before starting the hunt and advise your team leader. (This will make it a bit more interesting instead of seeing everyone go for HGSS starters as they are the most efficient.)

name: 8192 Shiny
games: All main series from gen 1 to gen 5 excluding B2W2 (as they can have charm) + Colosseum and XD Gale of Darkness
evidence: Picture must be of the target or target area if doing RE’s. + Summary screen with date provided in at least one of the pictures.

name: Sword and Shield Strong Spawn Soft Resets
evidence: Can be set up using the date skip method to spawn on pokemon but shiny must be obtained on the set date (set date back once hunt begins). + Can also be done as random encounters but proof must be provided that it was the strong spawn based on the area you got it (Easily use your switch to record a short video clip)

name: Friend Safari
evidence: Set the friend safari you will be hunting in and list or photograph possible encounters. + Photo of battle with the shiny and summary screen with date evidence.
